content: What is the status of accepting PractitionerRole in STU3, vs role backbone element within Practitioner? There is a note in PratitionerRole stating that the role element within Practitioner will be removed if PractitionerRole is accepted. I am working on design for an application and the development team focused only on Practitioner resource to define roles. Need clarification on best path foward using STU3 when published.
@Brian Postlethwaite @Cooper Thompson @Line Saele

This has been approved by the workgroup (at the WGM), and FMG last week.
I'm yet to apply the change, but will do so this weekend.
Then see the full impact on samples and other IGs

Thanks @Brian Postlethwaite, so as part of this update will the role backbone element within Pratitioner be removed for STU-3? I assume that's what you mean by "full impact on samples", just want to confirm so that I can communicate this expectation to our development team.
This change has now been committed, I also udpated all the examples!
